english.segment1: my jasmine, you're so beautiful to me. my jasmine, more than a billion dollar ring. I'm so glad God gave you to me. sleepy angel face of peace. i'm so glad God gave you to me. now close your eyes and go to sleep
english.segment2: and goodnight, goodnight. may God keep you and hold you tight. goodnight, goodnight. my baby love goodnight
english.segment3: max ryan josiah, mama's precious little boys. max, ryan, josiah you always bring me so much joy
english.segment4: I'm so glad God gave you to me. sleepy angels face of peace. I'm so glad God gave you to me. now close your eyes and go to sleep
